programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of Behind the Blend, Sean sits down with Jack Heyer, the product manager for Camacho cigars, who shares his journey from being a cigar enthusiast to working for his favorite company, Davidoff, under the Camacho brand. Jack discusses the Camacho Triple Maduro cigar, noting its unique all-Maduro blend, which took 84 tries to perfect, and its long-standing popularity as the company's second-best-selling cigar. He also touches on the brand's successful 2013 rebrand, which aimed to make their cigars more visually appealing and approachable to a new generation of smokers, while maintaining the high quality and consistency that Davidoff is known for.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: Discover Mexican San Andres tobacco's rich history and unique flavors in this Privada Cigar Club documentary.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: The Cigar Box Lounge in Edgewood, Florida, offers a comfortable and community-focused cigar experience, featuring a wide selection of cigars, unique amenities like complimentary coffee and bottle service, and a strong commitment to exceptional customer service.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiasts Mark and Alex to review the My Father Fonseca cigar. Together, they examine its smooth, balanced flavors, flawless construction, and overall performance, sharing their insights on why this cigar is a favorite among connoisseurs.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionado Marcus Newman to review the Bond Roberts Linea cigar. Together, they discuss its rich flavor profile, smooth draw, and craftsmanship, offering their expert takes on what sets this cigar apart from others in its class.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: A hidden gem in the heart of Tampa. Known for its inviting atmosphere and extensive selection of premium cigars, Sterling offers both seasoned aficionados and curious newcomers a place to unwind. The episode dives into the lounge‚Äôs history, the art of cigar pairing, and the vibrant community it fosters.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: Dave, BG, and guest Tony (from Crux Cigars) smoke and discuss the Crux Guild, a versatile cigar with an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper and Nicaraguan filler/binder, known for its warm baking spice and nutty, cedary notes. Tony also highlights the Crux Limitada, featuring eight tobaccos from five regions and a proprietary 12-year-aged Habano seed Estel√≠ wrapper. They delve into Crux's strategic packaging, including five-packs with tasting notes and QR codes to educate consumers, and discuss the importance of supporting local businesses and the vibrant, familial community within the cigar industry.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, owner of The Cigar Quarters - Dr. Anthony Grant - helps our host Bryan Baiss rate and review the La Rosa Negra cigar. Join us to find out how this stick stacks up to the rest!

programme.title: Guest Chief Carmen Best
programme.desc: In this episode of Black Arm of the Law Podcast, Dr. Rachelle Brackney interviews Carmen Best, the former chief of police in Seattle, Washington. They discuss Best's background, career, and the challenges she faced as a black woman in policing. Best shares her experiences in the military and how it shaped her leadership style. She also talks about her transition from the military to policing and the testing and training experiences she went through. The episode concludes with Best's emotional response to not being selected as the chief of police. Carmen discusses her experiences and leadership lessons during the COVID-19 pandemic and the George Floyd protests. She emphasizes the importance of recognizing misalignment of values and leaving when necessary. Best also highlights the need for nimble thinking and collaboration with unconventional partners during crises. She shares her strategies for coordinating the COVID-19 response and handling the occupation of the precinct. Best concludes by emphasizing the significance of being one's own mentor, ally, and sponsor.

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: Jack and Jill: The Hills of Hell
programme.desc: After searching for her missing daughter, a lady and her search party discover the legend behind the murderous pair of Jack and Jill...

programme.title: Village of the Vampire
programme.desc: Rebecca is searching for her sister, a young journalist who went missing while investigating a series of unfortunate events. The trail leads her to Timere, a remote place far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, where amidst the tight lipped silence of the town's inhabitants there's an ever growing fear of dark forces at work and no-one dares to leave their home at night. Here Rebecca meets an extravagant writer, the church warden of the town and above all Caleb, a charming, rich and elegant man whose dark gaze hides a chilling secret. It's in this town, where time appears to move between the shadows and danger lurks around every corner that Rebecca learns of the terrible truth and the battle between good and evil begins...

programme.title: El Bosque del Diablo
programme.desc: Rachel y su equipo de cineastas viajan a Transilvania, Rumania, para documentar los fenómenos paranormales en el bosque de Hoia-Baciu...

programme.title: Mi Sangriento Cumpleaños
programme.desc: Tras un terrible trauma en su cumpleaños, Emma decide no volver a celebrarlo. Pero al cumplir 21, una amiga rompe el ritual con una fiesta sorpresa, sin percatarse del despertar de los horrores que durante años han estado acechando en la oscuridad...

programme.title: La Feria del Diablo
programme.desc: Protagonizada por Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson y John Charles Dickson. Las estrellas de dos series de televisión paranormales, rivales y enfrentadas, convergen en un parque de atracciones embrujado y abandonado que termina siendo el epicentro del infierno. Ahora están todos atrapados en una guerra sin cuartel contra el mal puro...

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: El Basukazo 2
programme.desc: Después de haber sido dado por muerto, Edgar es rescatado por una bella mujer que trabaja en la mafia, cuando Edgar se recupera de sus heridas se integra al nuevo equipo ya que se necesita un hombre que sea experto en el manejo de las armas.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: Como El Gato y El Ratón
programme.desc: El barrio de La Estrella es uno de los más pobres de Bogotá. Allí habitan ciudadanos que han sido desplazados por la guerra y la violencia. Un día y tras años de espera, la luz eléctrica llega al barrio. La gente lo celebra y, pese a oponerse el edil, deciden usarla de manera ilegal. Todo se complicará cuando dos familias tengan un conflicto por unos cables cruzados.

programme.title: Dos Abrazos
programme.desc: Cuatro personas que se ven forzadas a defenderse ante la vida, un ensimismado chico de doce años, la cajera que tiene un encuentro con él, un airado conductor de taxi y la enajenada hija de uno de sus pasajeros, se reúnen en dos abrazos.

programme.title: El Bosque del Silencio
programme.desc: UNA MUCHACHA CONOCIO A UN HOMBRE POR INTERNET Y SE ENAMORA DE EL UN DIA DECIDIO IR A VERLO EN PERSONA, AUNQUE SU FAMILIA SE LO PROHIBIO ELLA DE CUALQUIER MANERA SE FUE PERO CUANDO LO VIO NO PODIA CREER LO QUE PASO

programme.title: Vecinos del Terror
programme.desc: Por accidente se les dispara un arma con el impacto matan al cuñado quien después regresa de ultratumba a cobrar venganza y ni la policía se escapa de la venganza de ultratumba

programme.title: Los Siete Sellos de la Santa Muerte
programme.desc: Una serie de extraños asesinatos están ocurriendo en la ciudad. Una investigadora de lo paranormal y un detective privado se dedican a indagar en el caso y lo que encontraran será algo que nunca imaginaron.

programme.title: Expediente 53 2.0
programme.desc: Mientras el líder de los delincuentes de la ciudad, Jack se reúne con el demonio Lilly alias Abal en un antro/table para matar y tomar las almas de sus víctimas. El FBI pide ayuda de unos sacerdotes solo que el hermano menor de Jack es poseído por Abal y ahora Jack tendrá que tomar una de las decisiones más difíciles de su vida.

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.
